byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and ERIC SCHMITT

abstract: Senior United States military officials say it is imperative offensive to retake Syrian city of Raqqa begin in coming weeks, in order to prevent suspected plans by Islamic State to initiate terrorist attacks on Western targets, possibly from inside city.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Planning to Start Assault on Raqqa Soon
headline.main: Warning of ISIS Plots Against West, U.S. Plans Assault on Raqqa

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Senior military officials said the fight would begin within weeks to retake the de facto ISIS capital, where planning is believed to be underway on terrorist attacks....
lead_paragraph: Senior military officials said the fight would begin within weeks to retake the de facto ISIS capital, where planning is believed to be underway on terrorist attacks.
